sentence: move the leftmost blue block to the front left side of the block that you just moved
move the leftmost blue block to the front left side of the center purple block
move the frontmost metallic blue block to the diagonal left front side of the purple block that you just moved
move the frontmost metallic blue block to the diagonal left front side of the middle purple block
